thread.title: Christian
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by Christian

author: Christian
title: Christian
text: Today I was helped by two individuals and both were extremely helpful. I was originally registered with a man named Charlie, I didn't get his last name, but he welcomed me and got me registered very quickly. Secondly, I was taken care of by Danielle Bishop. She got me an appointment scheduled around my busy schedule and was very courteous. I will definitely recommend! Thanks!
